name: Calvin Tucker's Redneck Farm Animals Racing Tournament
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Get Yer Redneck On!

Calvin Tucker’s Redneck: Farm Animal Racing Tournament is a wacky kart game with loads of typical redneck humor.

Their crazy organized tournaments brings them from the Farm to the tropical Pirate island, from the Polar to Egypt and from inside the Pyramid they are warped into time to the Medieval times and returning by UFO back in time again.
